channel.title: Going to war!
channel.description:
Yeah, last drill we had our FTX (Field Training Exercises) meeting, which means we had a lot of fun outside! Everything from War Games to learning how to maneuver down a dirt road full of booby traps!
Anyway, this is a pick of me after we finished putting on our face paint for the war games:
[img]http://img2.imageshack.us/img2/707/gameface.jpg[/img]
Don't judge me. :)
Yeah, the funniest thing happened...
We were talking about rambo right before the war games...and this kid had the bright idea to try to "rambo" it.
Well, he ran up the middle shooting and (I was on the defensive side) we just lit him up, the poor kid cried :)
was so funny

item.title: Going to war!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I’ll miss you if you go overseas. It’s been fun bullshitting around with you on the IRC and I hope you don’t get killed/injured over there. When you come back, give your girlfriend a victory hair sniff for me, maybe 2, and tell me if it smells anything like sunchips.

Read full topic

item.title: Going to war!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

If you do get sent to war then you have numerous decisions to make, especially regarding capture (as thiefmn mentioned).
I considered the army a while back, but never did it. I also made the choice to off myself if I was ever at a high risk of being captured by enemy combatants.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“maniown, post:27, topic:280835”][quote author=io9 link=topic=370896.msg2806133#msg2806133 date=1243736320]
No, they use actual bullets. The losing team is too unfit for the corps and must be executed.
[/quote]

Thank god i’m not overweight like you then. Survival of the fittest.[/quote]
sry, l2notbeanidiot.

Read full topic

item.title: Going to war!
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Yes, we use Paintball guns, and 1 hit you’re out.

Well, if the paintball bursts on you, you are out.
If it grazes you, you’re still in.

It’s really fun, especially when you get some weeds and take cover and snipe everyone

Read full topic

item.title: Going to war!
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“haticks, post:23, topic:280835”][quote author=Evil_ link=topic=370896.msg2804239#msg2804239 date=1243631311]

When the army fails send in the marines! (royal marines that is…)
[/quote]For the record, Marines are the first to go in (In America anyway)

But yea, the Army is really just place holders from what I hear…except SF which my friend is trying to convince me to do with him
[/quote] is your friends name tyler? Doubt it.

Anyway, im thinking of joining the marines out of high school. But well see.[/quote]Nope, his name is Kody.

[quote=“Man UTD Freak, post:22, topic:280835”][quote author=Evil_ link=topic=370896.msg2803327#msg2803327 date=1243565984]
Well, in that picture it was right behind the Armory haha, we went to the woods

item.title: Going to war!
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

united0wnage:

My friend is in the marine corps right not hes a field sniper he uses a .50 cal He’s station back in the USA currently for a back problem due to an IED (ithink Improved explosive device? I dunno) either way, we may even be going to war with korea due to their un authorized testing of nukes. Yay more death for pointless causes. either way, war games is fun.

It’s improvised explosive device.
